title: My Diet Diary
description: An interactive web app that helps user achieve a healthier lifestyle by monitoring BMI results and tracking daily food intake.

title: BTS Song Recommendation
description: A website that helps ARMYs choose which BTS songs to listen to by selecting mood categories, and get BTS song recommendations.

title: Mental Health during Pandemic
description: An interactive data visualization website that investigates different aspects of people's personal welling during the pandemic.

title: Coffee Makers Customer Review Analysis
description: A web scraping + data analysis project that investigates customer preferences by scraping and analyzing customer review data from coffee maker product URLs on Amazon.

title: Agricultural Supply Chain Database Design
description: A database design project for an agricultural supply chain to reduce food waste and increase profit.

title: Potential Salary Outcomes
description: An interactive data visualization web app that explores potential salary outcomes after graduation.

title: MyCovidKit
description: An all-in-one mobile app prototype for residents to view the availability of locations offering PCR tests and self-test kits. Our team was nominated for Top 3 Finalists for Best Design out of 60 teams.

title: ConnectParents
description: A mobile app prototype that provides access to individualized COVID-19 resources.
